description: Council of Elders - Advisory members for HiveMind governance

criteria.description: Council members are chosen based on sustained contribution, community trust, and alignment with Charter principles
requirements: Willingness to serve in advisory capacity

responsibilities: Provide thoughtful feedback on significant changes
Offer wisdom and perspective on governance matters
Uphold Charter principles in all interactions

nomination.method: Community nomination or repository owner invitation
nomination.approval: Repository owner decision with community input

term.emeritus_transition: Members may transition to emeritus status at any time

removal.voluntary: Members may step down at any time
removal.involuntary: Repository owner may remove for Charter violations

notes: This list starts empty and can be updated as the community grows
Membership is an honor and a service, not a position of power
All council actions are advisory and transparent
